author: sky.cactus
content: Would any of the editors be opposed to me closing every EIP proposed today and telling people to re-open tomorrow if they actually mean it?  Editors already are *woefully* understaffed, and reviewing a bunch of "jokes" from people only makes that problem worse, especially when they aren't all *obviously* jokes (I just spent a bunch of time reviewing an EIP only to realize at the end that it was a "joke").

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't mind waiting to close them all until tomorrow so people can have their "fun" if that is more palatable (and I'll just not review anything for 48 hours).

author: sky.cactus
content: Alternatively, I could just leave all reviews today for other editors.
